Headline: #94 California Temporary Southbound Reroute near California/Fullerton
ShortDescription: Southbound 94 California  buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Fullerton, Milwaukee, and California due to, street blockage near California/Fullerton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California  buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Fullerton, Milwaukee, and California due to, street blockage near California/Fullerton.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Reroute at Harrison/Kilpatrick
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Congress, Kostner, Jackson and Cicero due to street blockage near Harrison/Kilpatrick.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Congress, Kostner, Jackson and Cicero due to street blockage near Harrison/Kilpatrick.
